snippet: Conservatives’ anger grew as they found clues in the decision on the health care mandate that Chief Justice John G. Roberts Jr. might have shifted his stance during deliberations.
abstract: Supreme Court Memo: conservatives are furious after Chief Justice John G Roberts Jr joins the court's liberal wing to uphold the health care overhaul law, especially after studying the decision and finding clues that Roberts may have shifted his stance during deliberations.
